title: What is the interpretation of a dream about hugging and kissing a lover alone, according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s chest and an unmarried woman’s kiss: This dream symbolizes love and affection, as it carries many interpretations and repercussions, and this varies according to the social status of the viewer, and also varies according to the interpretation of dream scholars. We will discuss the interpretation of this dream in detail through our website. Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s chest and a single kiss by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s chest and a kiss for an unmarried woman. A dream about hugging a person indicates a girl’s need for love, self-control, and attention, as well as love and warmth. A dream about someone hugging someone she knows in a dream shows her love for that person , as it shows affirmation and a feeling of security with him, and hugging someone she knows with tears symbolizes her need to be that person. By her side and not leaving her. The dream may indicate her trust in this person, her attachment to him, and the creation of a love relationship between them. Seeing a girl hugging someone without feelings between them is evidence of his interest in her, but seeing her father or mother hugging her tightly is evidence of her feeling of fear and turmoil that she will lose one of them. Seeing someone hugging her from behind indicates his ability to carry her, care for her, and give her the love and affection she needs. An unmarried girl hugging a young girl in a dream is evidence of the girl’s need to become a mother, and in general this vision shows the girl’s need for love and affection around her. What Interpretation of a dream about a lover’s embrace and a single kiss by Ibn Sirin? Seeing her hugging her lover is evidence of her intense desire to communicate with him, as well as her intense love for him. If he does not know the person who embraced him, this means that a love relationship between them will develop in the near future. If a single woman sees that she is hugging a dead person, the vision means a long life for her, as well as symbolizing a lot of thinking about this person, especially before sleeping. The vision also shows confidence in the person she is hugging, especially if you know him. You still do not find An interpretation of your dream? Go to Google and search for the Egyptian dream interpretation site. The most important interpretations of a dream about a lover’s embrace and a single kiss. Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried friend’s breast. A friend’s breast is interpreted as saying goodbye to travel or moving to live in another place. The vision depends on the extent of love and understanding between her and her friend and whether her friend lives in a far place or not. The girl can see. For her, the dream was evidence of longing and longing to see her, and it indicates a true friendship that does not affect the presence of any problems or disagreements. Interpretation of dreams: When I hug someone I do not know, the vision may be evidence that the girl is going through a new experience that makes her gain more experience from her to know anything new, Or a warning to her not to trust anyone she knows and that she should be careful, and the vision is a warning to her to be alert and aware of everyone around her. She is unable to express her feelings properly, which indicates the oppression she is suffering from. Interpretation of a dream about hugging and kissing my beloved. If there is a relationship between the girl and the man she is hugging in reality, then the vision indicates marriage and connection to him. The dream is also interpreted by feeling comfortable and safe with him . The vision from the

title: Learn about the interpretation of seeing banknotes in a single woman’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing paper money in a dream for a single woman: Money is the goal that most people are trying to achieve, and the vision is one of the visions in which there are many disagreements among jurists, and this vision has many meanings that differ depending on the meanings, including that the money be paper or metal, and it can be Red or green, and can be paper money. It was found or removed by someone. What concerns us in this article is that we study all the indicators and special cases of seeing banknotes in a single woman’s dream. Learn about the interpretation of seeing banknotes in a single woman’s dream. Paper money in a single woman’s dream. Seeing money in a dream represents Success, self-confidence, achieving desired goals, establishing social ties, and openness to many other cultures. This vision is also a sign of prosperity, prosperity, fertility of ideas, and ambition to build a bright future and get rid of many obstacles that prevent him from achieving his goal. As for the interpretation of a dream about paper money for a single woman This vision indicates distant desires and ambitions and the many desires that you want to achieve, no matter how bumpy the roads are. This vision is also an indication of the worries and problems that she faces in achieving her dreams, and the restrictions that surround her and that she tries to free herself from by any means. On the other hand, seeing leaves Cash indicates the emotional and psychological state, fluctuations, internal conflicts, and the difficulty of achieving a balance between the requirements of the heart and the judgments of the mind. The vision may indicate a lack of funds to complete projects and plans that you would like to benefit from in the long term, and the deprivation of many powers that facilitate the path. Paper money in a dream by Waheed Ibn Sirinla It is worth something. Ibn Sirin did not tell us about the interpretation of paper money, but he went on to explain the vision of the dirham and the dinar, and from this interpretation we can discern some of the connotations that express the vision of money in general, and look into them. As follows: Ibn Sirin believes that seeing money indicates prevailing problems and concerns, many useless disputes, and many disputes that lead to disagreements and dangerous quarrels. This vision indicates estrangement, conflict, strife, gossip, unstable circumstances, satisfying one’s demands, and following Passions, and lack of rule of reason. As for Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the dream of banknotes for an unmarried woman, this vision indicates the crises and sorrows that the dreamer still has to face and the confusion of life that she has not yet experienced. On the other hand, this vision suggests a high ceiling of Desires and ambitions with the impossibility of achieving them and great visions of the future that you wish to have. Seeing paper money in a dream is also a sign of worry that her efforts will fail, or that she will lose her favorite things, or that the situation will get worse and her efforts will be wasted. And if an unmarried woman sees that She has a lot of money, this indicates the restrictions that surround her, and the crises that surround her

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a golden ring by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a golden ring: Interpreters believe that the dream carries many interpretations that vary depending on the details of the dream and the feelings of the viewer. In the lines of this article, we will talk about the interpretations of seeing a golden ring for single, pregnant, and married women. And men and divorced women according to Ibn Sirin and leading scholars in the field of dream interpretation.Interpretation of a dream about a golden ring by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about a golden ringThe golden ring in a dream indicates that the dreamer bears a lot of responsibility in the current period, which causes him psychological pressure and tension, and seeing the golden ring means that the dreamer will succeed in His working life quickly expanded his work. The fact that the dreamer has more than one gold ring in a dream indicates that he is a social person and has many friends and acquaintances. It is said that dreaming of a golden ring indicates the abundance of life and the blessing of health and money. Seeing a gold ring brings him good news about an imminent marriage to a beautiful and fair woman. Interpretation of a dream about a golden ring by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a golden ring indicates power and high status in society. Even her imminent pregnancy, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. Also, the dream of a narrow ring for a married man is evidence of his love for his wife and his devotion to her. If the dreamer is single and dreams that he borrows a golden ring from a stranger, this means that he will soon enter into a fleeting relationship that will end after a while. Gurna is a sign of livelihood, health, money and good offspring. An Egyptian website, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just type Egyptian Dream Interpretation Website on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about a golden ring for a single woman. A golden ring in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates that she will get married soon. From a handsome, fair man with good behavior among people, and seeing a golden ring indicates that the dreamer is a strong and intelligent person who fully bears responsibilities and can make her own decisions without being subject to the decisions of others, and it was said that the golden ring in a dream symbolizes a golden opportunity that will soon knock on the dreamer’s door in Her working life, and she must take advantage of it and do good. Using it. Seeing a large golden ring for an unmarried woman foretells that there is a handsome man who will propose to her soon and she will live with him in a beautiful and successful relationship that will affect her positively. A dream about a golden ring means that she will hear good news. Related to family or friends in the near future, and if the visionary is a seeker of education and strives to achieve and reach high levels, the dream announces that she will reach her goals and will not waste her efforts. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a gold ring for a single girlIf the dreamer is living a love story at the present time and sees in her dream that she She wears a gold ring, it means that her lover will propose marriage soon and his story will be crowned with a happy marriage. It is said that wearing a gold ring in a dream indicates positive changes that will happen to her in her professional life. Soon, and if an unmarried woman wears a gold ring on her left hand, the dream suggests that she...

title: A gift of gold in a dream

preview.html: A gift of gold in a dream. Dream interpreters have interpreted that seeing a gift of gold in a dream indicates goodness that will soon come to the pioneer. If a single person sees gold in a dream, this is news that he will marry his partner and they will live a happy life. And when the dreamer sees in a dream that he is giving a gift of gold For someone close to him, this is a sign of good, happy and joyful news that will come to him soon. If the fortuneteller sees that he is giving gold to an unknown person, this is evidence that the fortuneteller has received a promotion for his work. If the dreamer sees that he is giving a gift of gold to someone he knows, this is a sign of achieving What he wants. When you see a girl in a dream wearing a gold chain, this indicates the arrival of kindness and livelihood. But if an unmarried woman sees a stranger giving her a gold chain and wearing it, this is a sign of an upcoming engagement with this person. Seeing a gold chain in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates an easy birth. , and that she and her fetus are fine. Seeing that she is buying a gold chain in a married woman’s dream is good news for her that she will give birth to good offspring and that God will give her whatever she desires. You may be interested: A gift of a gold necklace in a dream for a married woman. A gift of gold in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Muhammad ibn Sirin explained that if The dreamer saw someone giving him a golden bracelet in his dream, it means that the dreamer is a loved person who is known for helping others. In the event that an unmarried woman sees herself wearing a golden bracelet, this is a sign that a person with morals, wealth, and status will deal with her. But if a man sees in his dream that he Wearing a gold bracelet, this vision is evidence of the fears and consequences that he is experiencing. When the dreamer sees in a dream that a deceased person is giving him gold, the dream indicates wealth, kindness, and abundance of money in the future. In the event that the dreamer is suffering from worries and consequences and sees in his dream a dead person giving him gold This is a sign to the dreamer that all his consequences and problems will go away. If the dreamer works in a job and sees in his dream that the deceased gives him gold, this indicates his promotion in his job. A gift of gold in a dream for a single woman. The jurists interpreted that if a girl sees in her dream a well-known person giving her gold, This indicates good news. But if the girl is working and sees someone giving her gold and wearing it, this is a sign of her promotion and obtaining a prestigious and large job. The vision of buying gold indicates her engagement to a person who makes her happy and loves her, and the vision indicates the arrival of happy news. When a girl sees in a dream that Someone gives her a gold bar, this indicates that there will be difficulty in her life. But if an unmarried woman sees someone giving her a lot of gold jewelry, this indicates the happiness and joy that she experiences. We have chosen for you: Seeing gold in a dream for a manA gift of gold in a dream For a pregnant woman, jurists interpreted that seeing a gift of gold in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign that her life will change for the better, and it also indicates many good things that she will obtain. When a pregnant woman sees that her husband is giving her a gift of gold, this indicates stability between them. If a woman sees Pregnant A

title: Interpretation of a dream about onions by Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about onions Many studies have shown the benefits of eating onions and considering it an antibiotic to fight many diseases, in addition to the minerals and vitamins it contains. Criticism and difficulties, due to its undesirable smell, and for this we will raise all the chatter according to the color of the onion, whether red or green and others, in addition to the facts that the person sees, through this article, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about onions There are many meanings and interpretations of seeing onions in a dream, according to the visual details, as the vision of cutting onions differs from peeling or eating them, and for this reason our scholars mentioned many interpretations related to seeing onions and whether it brings good or evil to the dreamer. It was found that white onions in a dream are signs of falling into calamities and crises, as it is a sign that a person carries many worries and burdens in his life and accumulates debts on him, which makes it difficult. To pay them or find a way to overcome this ordeal. Seeing green onions can be a sign of goodness and happiness, but in some cases it warns of the presence of unscrupulous competitors, especially in his workplace, so he must be careful and prove his value and abilities at work so that he does not go. An opportunity to harm him. Interpretation of a dream about onions by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin shows many rumors about seeing onions in a dream, and these interpretations range between good and evil. Seeing onions can be a sign of comfort and reveal problems and disputes from a person's life, so he will be happy with a calm and stable life. But his interpretations are completed that onions also carry a warning to the dreamer about his involvement in a crisis or a difficult situation that is difficult to escape from, so his life is dominated by sadness and depression and he may eventually resort to disappointment and to being delivered. And we walk the path of failure and setbacks. It was also said that onions are a commendable sign of a lot of sustenance and goodness that the dreamer will soon obtain, but it is worth noting the need to make a lot of struggle and sacrifice to get this money, as the dream is usually associated with misery and toil until a man reaches his goals. The symbol of onions in Al-Osaimi's dream Al-Osaimi believes that seeing onions in a dream symbolizes different interpretations that lead to happiness or unhappiness. If he sees red onions in his dream, this indicates the dreamer's success in his emotional life and his enjoyment of good luck in finding the right life partner, and thus it ends with a happy marriage, God willing. As for the dream of white onions, it indicates health and psychological crises, especially if the dreamer sees that he is eating it in the dream, but if he only cuts it, the interpretations change, so that it indicates his accuracy and reasoning. Decision-making, so it is difficult to make mistakes. Al-Osaimi also indicated the good interpretation of seeing raw onions in a dream, because it is a sign of the good and benefit that the dreamer will obtain, whether through a promotion at work or through his partnership in a successful business, which will bring him a lot of financial gains and profits. Interpretation of a dream about onions for a single woman If a single girl sees

title: More than 100 interpretations of the dream of betrayal in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Discover the interpretation of a dream about betrayal in a dream. One of the dreams that represents great anxiety and fear for dreamers is the dream of betrayal. This vision varies between a dream of betrayal of a wife or husband and perhaps betrayal of a friend or any other person, because the scene deserves interpretation. We decided inside a specialized Egyptian website to explain it in detail, here are the most accurate details of the vision in the article below. Interpretation of a dream about betrayal in a dream Below is the strongest evidence for interpreting the vision of betrayal in a dream in the following lines: If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is a traitor and betrays his wife or friend or acts in general with betrayal Towards any person in his life, the scene is very bad and can reveal three signs: First: Betrayal is one of the dreamer’s personality traits. Second: The dreamer desires this and is waiting for an opportunity to commit betrayal without any consequences behind it. Third: That the dreamer wants revenge on this person (The one who betrayed him in the vision) because there are disagreements or quarrels between them, and in this case the betrayal in the dream will only be the discharge of negative tasks that the dreamer has stored. His subconscious mind. The jurists said: If the disgraced person testifies that he is a victim of the betrayal of someone he knows, or is closely connected to in his waking life, then this is a sign that the perpetrator of the betrayal is a person whose heart is pure. And you fulfilled the truth, but this interpretation is not general and comprehensive for all cases, but it has some classifications that we will explain in the following paragraphs. In fact, if a financially available person sees himself betrayed in a dream, the symbol of betrayal here does not mean that he will soon be stabbed by his loved ones through his betrayal. For him, the scene is linked to his financial situation. Soon the dreamer will collapse financially and his money will be gone. Unfortunately whenever the dreamer carries great negative feelings and great sadness after seeing that he has been betrayed, this will happen. With a big loss of money it can make him poor soon enough. If the dreamer has power and high positions, if he dreams that he A victim of the betrayal of his enemies, the dream is interpreted by three signs: Whether or not: The dreamer’s fear of serious betrayal in wakefulness, and therefore the vision will be self-talk and miserable dreams. Second: Perhaps the vision confirms that his enemies are even preparing for a deadly attack on him, and they may succeed in betraying him, or God Almighty has sent him. This vision is to warn him, and to pay attention to all means of protecting him while he is awake, so that he does not succeed in undermining him, and he can confront them with all his strength. Third: The dream indicates that he will lose power and prestige, which is what he enjoys at the present time, and fate may lead him to poverty and distress as well. The dreamer who is suffering From poverty and drought in real life, if he sees in his dream that he is in pain because of the betrayal he has been exposed to, then the vision reveals the following: The lies surrounding them are his friends, and soon they will abandon him and betray him. For example, if the fortuneteller is one of those who have money and God tests him in his money in a state of alert, then his friends will ally with his enemies and reject it with the fortuneteller, and he will certainly face his circumstances alone without support or person. To help him overcome it successfully.The dreamer who has friends wakes up dreams of betrayal and betrayal, then here is the symbol of betrayal

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about buying gold by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about buying gold Buying gold is one of the things that makes people very happy because it is one of the most valuable things they own and some people love gold because of its beautiful shape and its use in ornaments and trinkets. Is it special or does it have bad connotations? We discuss the most important interpretations of a dream about buying gold, so follow us. Interpretation of a dream about buying gold Interpreters confirm that there are good meanings associated with buying gold in a dream, especially if the dreamer has children of marriageable age, so his son will get married in the near future, and among the connotations of buying it is also that there is happiness. Circumstances that accept the life of a person who may be connected to him or his family and change the sadness or psychological pressures that he experiences when things change completely with his purchase. Imam Al-Nabulsi says that buying gold in a dream is good news, especially if one buys gold money, as his situation changes during work He enjoys high status and prestige and obtains another job or salary increases in the current job. If you buy gold and give it to a mother or sister, the meaning indicates love and appreciation for the person to whom you gave it. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream of buying gold. Ibn Sirin shows many indications related to buying gold in a dream, and the meaning varies according to the things that the dreamer bought, in addition to achieving many goals. That the sleeper wants. Some interpretations of Ibn Sirin confirm that gold in a dream can indicate problems and the presence of some problems around a person, due to its yellow color, which is undesirable in the interpretation, while there are some good things that are purchased from gold, especially If the person is happy with her, then the dream shows the approach of his relationship and marriage or indicates pregnancy for a woman. Interpretation of dreams about buying gold for single women. If an unmarried girl buys gold in her dream and gets engaged, this means that her marriage will take place in the coming period and she will feel great happiness and happiness with the person she has chosen. As for If she finds that someone is buying gold and giving it to her, this indicates that he feels very happy with her and wants to make her always feel safe. Sometimes you find a girl buying gold during her sleep, and this is interpreted as being very stable in many of the circumstances of her life, whether practical, so the The livelihood is great and good and she lives in bliss and beautiful days, while she sometimes buys others. It indicates success in her love life. High in her current job and her money is growing a lot. Sometimes unmarried women see that they are buying a set of shiny gold bracelets with shiny lobes, and in this case the meaning shows the abundance of beautiful news that they receive, and if they want to make money and money, the gold bracelet is a successful symbol of what you can get On it of money.Interpretation of a dream about buying gold for a married woman: A married woman may see that she is buying gold in her dream, and if she gets a bunch of gold money, this indicates that she is very happy with her financial situation and her coming life will also increase. Money or lost. Sometimes the lady takes the gold from the husband b

title: Interpretation of a dream about a hurricane

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a tornado in a dream: A vision that causes fear and anxiety to those who see it, especially since the tornado has a lot of damage that can reach the point of destruction, so dreaming of a tornado always makes the dreamer try to search for an explanation for this vision. The positive associations that we will try to highlight during this article are for some tornado scenes, such as seeing a black tornado in a dream, but we must advise you, dear reader, not to reject any interpretation we offer you. In any other vision, until you are asked a question by a scholar who specializes in dream interpretation. Interpretation of seeing a hurricane in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Dream interpretation scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing a hurricane in a dream indicates that the dreamer is always confused and confused. As Ibn Sirin sees in a dream A hurricane in the country, this indicates the coming war in this country, God forbid. As for the dreamer who sees in a dream that he is flying because of a hurricane, this indicates that this opinion will have the opportunity to travel to his relative - God willing -. The hurricane in the dream also tells Ibn Sirin that this indicates a psychological conflict within the dreamer, and God knows best. Seeing a hurricane in a singles’ dream. A girl who sees a hurricane in a dream indicates that there are some problems that she will face in her life. Also, single people in general who see a hurricane in a dream, this may be human for To them that they will get rid of many problems and worries in life - God willing -. Also, for an unmarried girl who sees in a dream a black tornado that she cannot escape from, this indicates that there are some problems with friends. Seeing a tornado in a dream for a married womanA married woman who Seeing a tornado in a dream indicates that there are a lot of problems and fears, but she will get rid of them soon - God willing. Just like a married woman sees a tornado hitting her in a dream, this may indicate, God forbid, that there is a disaster that she and her husband will face. As for A married woman sees in a dream that she is beating her husband because of a hurricane, this indicates that the husband will soon face a financial crisis, God forbid. Seeing the wreckage of a hurricane in a dream When she dreams of a hurricane destroying the house and opinion is trying to save it, this indicates that there is an opportunity for him to travel to express the opinion that It will help him improve his financial situation - God willing -. Just like the dreamer who sees in a dream that he was killed by a tornado, this indicates the suffering and exhaustion that the dreamer is going through. Seeing a black tornado in a dream A tornado in a dream generally indicates problems and problems that the dreamer faces. As for the black hurricane in the dream, this indicates that there are a group of radical changes that will occur in the dreamer’s life. As for the dream of a hurricane, but the dreamer is not afraid of it, this is a person getting rid of the worries and problems that he suffered from. Also, escaping from a storm in the dream indicates The presence of family disputes or social differences and quarrels that the dreamer is experiencing at the present time.

title: Interpretation of a thief in a dream for single, pregnant and married women

preview.html: Through this article, we present to you the interpretation of a thief in a dream. Theft is one of the major sins forbidden by Sharia law, where the thief or thief watches a person without suspecting him until he takes from him what is not his. It belongs to souls and takes people’s money unlawfully, but what is the benefit of seeing a thief in a dream? This is what we are talking about today through the following article on the encyclopedia website, so follow us. Interpretation of a thief in a dream. The interpretation of seeing a thief in a dream varies depending on the details present in the dream, and one of the most important interpretations is: A sick person sees a thief in his dream. This dream is one of the most promising dreams, as it indicates his recovery. From his illness, God willing. One of the bad dreams is that a person sees in his dream a thief wearing non-symbolic clothes, and this dream indicates that the dreamer will face problems in his life or that he will get sick, as some interpreters said that this dream means that there is a person in the dreamer’s life who is lurking around him and wants to kill him. It harms him. The thief who enters the house and does not steal anything from it, this dream is a good dream, as it indicates that the dreamer will travel to another country to earn a living, which will bring goodness to him and his family. The symbol of seeing a thief in a dream. Whoever saw in a dream a thief and the thief was unknown and could not identify On the face of it, this dream is a good dream, as it indicates that the dreamer will enter into a new relationship, either a marriage or a mixed marriage, or get a business partner. Whoever dreams that a thief enters his house and steals the things in the house, this dream is considered a bad dream, as it indicates Indicates that the dreamer will suffer from material or personal difficulties in his life. Interpretation of a thief who sees an unmarried woman in a dream. There are many interpretations given by dream interpretation scholars regarding an unmarried girl seeing a thief in her dream, such as: An unmarried girl who sees in her dream that a thief Her gold was stolen. This dream is a very promising dream because it shows that this girl will soon be engaged to the person she chose and saw as suitable. One of the unfavorable visions for an unmarried girl is that she sees in her dream that a thief is stealing something that belongs to her, and this dream means that this girl is associated with a hypocritical and deceitful person. And that he does not feel love towards her, such as telling her that he will hurt her, that he talks bad about her to others, and that he wants to ruin her reputation. This dream is a sign for her not to cling to him and to stay away from him immediately. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream that the thief is laughing at her. This dream indicates that he will establish an emotional relationship with a person with whom he feels stability and familiarity, and this relationship will end in a happy marriage, God willing. If an unmarried girl sees that a thief enters the house in which she lives, this dream means that she is suffering from some negative feelings and that she feels sadness and pain. But these sorrows will go away, God willing, and her life will be filled with joy and happiness. Arresting a thief in a dream for a single woman. A married woman dreams of a thief entering her house, and this dream symbolizes the problems that this woman is going through in her life, and she is having many arguments with her husband. If she sees The married woman said that the thief entered the house
